name: Hackflug
description:
This is a fangame for @StudioFizbin's the Inner World.

I love the world and characters of their game and I'm exited for the second game in the franchise.

In this game you play as one of the characters of The Inner World, the pidgeon Peck, and as a pidgeon it's obviously your goal to collect crumbs of bread, good luck!

Controls: 

  • arrow keys or D+A for steering
  • spacebar for moving

Note: The title "Hackflug" is german and is translated to "flight of the Peck"
